title: Police: Man shot in Morrell Park overnight
content:
A man was shot in Baltimore's Morrell Park neighborhood Thursday night, police said.
The man, who police have not yet identified, was shot in the 2400 block of Washington Boulevard at about 10:30 p.m. An officer who was in the area when he heard the nearby gunshots found the victim with gunshot wounds to the torso, police said. The victim later died at Shock Trauma, police said.
Witnesses were located and reported seeing an unidentified gunman shooting at the victim, but no other information was immediately available, police said.
Homicide detectives are investigating and ask anyone with information to call 410-396-2100 or call Metro Crime Stoppers at 1-866-7LOCKUP.
